title: Easter lamb cupcakes
ingredients: ['24 chocolate cupcakes', 'black liquorice string', '12 plain marshmallows', '48g edible sugar eyeballs', '500g mini marshmallows', 'Vanilla buttercream', '225g butter or margarine, softened', '1 pinch salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '625g icing sugar', '4 tablespoons milk']
